pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to lp_solve v. 5.5 // The lpSolveAPI [RlpSolve] package provides an R interface to the lp_solve library - lp_solve is a Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) solver with support for pure linear, (mixed) integer/binary, semi-continuous and special ordered sets (SOS) models. THIS PACKAGE IS MODIFIED FOR PORTFOLIO OPTIMIZATION WITH RMETRICS. FOR OTHER PURPOSES PLEASE USE THE ORIGINAL PACKAGE ON THE CRAN SERVER.
